description.value:
Prior to making a melee attack roll, you can choose to convert all damage from that strike into nonlethal damage, adding your Wisdom modifier to the damage. If your attack hits, as a free action you can attempt an Intimidate check to demoralize the target. You gain a bonus on this Intimidate check equal to the amount of nonlethal damage dealt by the painful smite. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

This power replaces the Destructive Smite power of the Destruction Domain.
